subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Defensive end Jonal Saint-Dic and linebacker SirDarean Adams, both seniors, are among five Michigan State players who will sit out the Champs Sports Bowl on Friday against No. 14 Boston College because of academic or other violations.The Spartans said Monday that Saint-Dic was academically ineligible, along with wide receiver and return specialist Terry Love, wide receiver/cornerback T. J. Williams and offensive guard Abre Leggins. Adams violated unspecified team rules.
